thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 7 of 519
thread.title: LR

author: LR
title: LR
text: The price and delivery time were very good. This company is worth ordering from. My warning to others would be they didn't communicate at all. The only email I received was from Google Trust Stores. It said if I had a problem to contact the seller before I contact Google. A week and a half later the contacts showed up on the door. So if you order just be prepared for no emails from this vendor.
